histogram.name: Mac.AppFileSystemType
histogram.summary: The file system type where the running instance of Chrome is installed. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.AppUpgradeCodeSignatureValidationStatus
histogram.summary: The dynamic code signature validation status of Chrome with a pending Chrome update on disk. A single metric is emitted about an hour after an update to the running instance of Chrome has been staged on disk.

histogram.name: Mac.LaunchApplicationResult
histogram.summary: The result of calls to base::mac::LaunchApplication, logged once for every invocation of that method.
